sentences.sContent: Kitty and Peter have decided to see Swan Lake'this saturday.
sentences.sContent_eng: Kitty and Peter have decided to see Swan Lake'this saturday.
sentences.sCn: 这个星期六基蒂和彼得决定去看“天鹅湖”。

sentences.sContent: There we’d find a rowboat that we could take to yet another trail, which would eventually lead us to Swan Lake.
sentences.sContent_eng: There we’d find a rowboat that we could take to yet another trail, which would eventually lead us to Swan Lake.
sentences.sCn: 在那里我们可以找到一条小船，划船到另外一条小道，最后可以到达天鹅湖。

sentences.sContent: The film begins with the prologue to "Swan Lake, " in which the sorcerer Rothbart casts his evil spell.
sentences.sContent_eng: The film begins with the prologue to "Swan Lake, " in which the sorcerer Rothbart casts his evil spell.
sentences.sCn: 影片在天鹅湖的序幕中开始，魔法师罗斯巴特施恶咒将公主变成了天鹅。
